giftCardSection.title: Promote Your Profile
giftCardSection.description: Embed a link to your ARTMO profile on your websites.

giftCardContent.title: Your new ARTMO Card:
giftCardContent.quesion: Who should we send your ARTMO Card to?
giftCardContent.lastNote: Your purchase receipt will be available on your Profile. You will receive a confirmation to your account email as well.
